subject: Running
Gifts
lead_paragraph: A Manhattan man’s family paid $400 to get Richard Kiplagat, a world-class Kenyan road racer, to agree to go running with him on his 40th birthday.
snippet: A Manhattan man’s family paid $400 to get Richard Kiplagat, a world-class Kenyan road racer, to agree to go running with him on his 40th birthday.
